Tech quote

My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
Your Account Rep:
Phone Number: Email:
Placing a large tech order? Get volume discounts. Receive quotes directly from our site.
4 Simple Steps *
1. Fill your cart with $5,000+ or 50+ tech items. Select Request Quote.
2. Enter your Contact & Shipping Information, Unique Quote Name and notes (if needed) for your Account Manager. Select Submit Review.
3. We'll review your quote within 24 hours. Access your Quote Manager tool to see your quote. It will display a Pending Customer Review status.
4. Access the Quote Manager tool either through the homepage or My Account option to: • review your quote • accept the quote and place the order • resubmit the quote with additional questions • save the quote and put the order on hold • cancel quote *Quote Manager available on most Technology items.
©2014 Office Depot, Inc. All rights reserved. 6600 North Military Trail, Boca Raton, FL 33496 To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add officedepot@e.officedepot.com to your safe sender list or address book.
